mono.p: 「Eagle」 wasn’t a swordsman, but a soldier.
What he used weren’t swords, but greatswords.
Thus, whenever he held the hilt backward, he habitually turns his wrist,
so that the bladed edge would face the enemy.
But tonight——[\s]
Tonight, at this moment between life and death,
「Eagle」 had a strange idea.[\s]
This idea took root and sprouted unknowingly when he sword danced earlier.
(Swords are double edged, unlike greatswords…)
This was just an idea, but it lingered.[\s]
This was just an idea, but it prompted 「Eagle」 to give up the habit of turning his wrists at the critical moment of life and death.
This saved him a moment of time.[\s]
Without this moment, he would’ve died before the blade reached the girl.
Like a bolt of lightning, the girl’s palm rushed towards his head.
「Eagle」 held the hilt of the sword and raised it with a backhanded grip. [\s]
Unlike greatswords, swords were double-edged.
Though, it only spared him a split moment of time, but the end results were quite different.
The sword, as sharp as iron, cut through the moonlight. [\s]
Its edge gently touched, penetrated, and bid farewell to the girl's body, dividing her into two.
It was as easy as cutting a piece of thin paper.
Her gaze froze staring blankly in the void, no longer moving; [\s]
And that fatal palm blade stopped dead in its track midair, no longer having power to move.
「Eagle」 killed the girl and took her sword.
Though hard, though cruel, it was a victory after all.
-That's how it should have been.
But when the point of the sword was about to stab Li Sushang's waist, 「Eagle」’s internal energy suddenly disappeared.
The tyrannical internal energy that he had cultivated over the years was gone, as if it had never existed in the first place. [\s]
No matter how he tried to summon it, there was no response from his empty meridians.
[em italic]Impossible–[/em]
A cold current named fear instantly flowed through 「Eagle」's veins.
[em italic]Impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible impossible——[/em]
There was absolutely no problem with his breathing and energy circulation,
He was also sure that he would never go crazy at this moment. [\s]
But, the impossible just happened, right when he was about to win.
This was the second time tonight,
「Eagle」 suddenly understood something, but it was too late…
The sudden loss of his internal energy made him barely capable of holding onto the handle as he swung.
「Xuanyuan」 sliced the girl in midair, the tip embedded deeply in a visible wound, and it was out of his grasp.
The girl's palm hit his cheek. [\s]
Accompanied by the sound of a slap and cracking bones, was great pain and unwillingness.
[em italic]Why?[/em]
Darkness rushed to embrace him from the shattered half of his skull, but he tried his best to resist... His eyes spun frantically, searching for...
[em italic]Why-[/em]
He saw. [\s]
Far away, in the drawing room of the broken post, in front of his favorite chair, a man stood.
[em italic]Raksha…[/em]
Beside this man, a coffin stood quietly.
[em italic]It was you……[/em]
The man looked at him in the distance. The candlelight flickered, and he struggled to look around, trying to see the man’s expression clearly--
[em italic]IT WAS YOU!!!!!![/em]

text.p: His thoughts only managed to get here.
His anger had barely risen, before the darkness claimed him.
